challenge.title: Test if an Object is an Instance of a Constructor
challenge.description:
As a reminder, this project is being built upon the following starter project on Gitpod, or cloned from GitHub.

#instanceOf asserts that an object is an instance of a constructor.
challenge.instructions: Within tests/1_unit-tests.js under the test labeled #18 in the Objects suite, change each assert to either assert.instanceOf or assert.notInstanceOf to make the test pass (should evaluate to true). Do not alter the arguments passed to the asserts.

tests.text: You should choose the correct method for the first assertion - instanceOf vs. notInstanceOf.
You should choose the correct method for the second assertion - instanceOf vs. notInstanceOf.
You should choose the correct method for the third assertion - instanceOf vs. notInstanceOf.
You should choose the correct method for the fourth assertion - instanceOf vs. notInstanceOf.
